channel.title: Security of Qubes install Win7 VM
channel.description:
All of the OPSEC is good enough.
I have to install win7-vm on Qubes since some software( .exe ) must run on it.
Is there has security issues will occur if win7-vm installed?
Any suggestion is welcome.

item.title: Security of Qubes install Win7 VM
item.dc:creator: Patrick
item.description:
Please move this to the Qubes support as per:

What to post in this Qubes-Whonix forum and what not. Qubes-Whonix
As a rule of thumb: Everything that happens "inside" the virtual machines is Qubes-Whonix and belongs into this sub forum. Everything that happens "outside" the virtual machine is Qubes and the Qubes help should be consulted. Some examples: EFI -> Qubes help Errors by by Qubes VM Manager (QVMM) -> Qubes help libvirtError -> Qubes help Issues that also apply to Debian based VMs. -> Qubes help error: Failed to save domain whonix-ws-dvm to /var/lib/qubes/appvms/whonix-ws-dvm/dvm-saveâ€¦

Closed.

Read full topic
item.source: Security of Qubes install Win7 VM
